title: Faction Schema
description: A Faction. Inherits From 'Star Wars Model'

AlliedCharacterIds.description: The id's of the characters that have pledged allegiance to this faction. Null for unknown

AlliedFactionIds.description: The id's of the factions that have pledged allegiance to this faction. Null for unknown

LeaderIds.description: The id's of the characters who are/have been leaders of the faction. Null for unknown

MemberCharacterIds.description: The id's of the characters who are/have been members of the faction. Null for unknown

MemberFactionIds.description: The id's of the factions who are/have been members of the faction. Null for unknown

OrganizationTypes.description: The type/s of the faction. Null for unknown. See 'Domain.Utils.OrganizationTypes' for availables
